definition: part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾爲香港科技大學學生會合唱團女高音聲部部長。

sentences.english: Does the conductor seek to rebalance the orchestra so that a certain orchestral voice is heard?
sentences.chinese: 指揮有沒有在尋求一種新的聲部平衡呢？

sentences.english: How do you get a viola section to play spiccato?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣讓中提琴聲部演奏跳弓呢？

sentences.english: Woe weeps out her division, when she sings.
sentences.chinese: 當她歌唱時，悲哀號哭出她的聲部。

sentences.english: I can do some video clips of the products or even look for someone to do the voice part.
sentences.chinese: 我可以做一些視頻剪輯的產品，甚至找人做的聲部。

sentences.english: Why does the melody show up in the high range?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼旋律聲部都在高音區呢？

sentences.english: Farmers chorus of part-singing in Huanggang Village of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 貴州黃崗村，農民的多聲部和聲歌隊。

sentences.english: I is a member of Zhao Wu, is the band's and voice.
sentences.chinese: 我是成員趙五，是樂隊的和聲部。

definition: double reed wind instrument (such as oboe or bassoon)
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
Haydn (name)/Franz Joseph Haydn (1732-1809), Austrian classical composer
